name: CompleteBloodCountWithDiff
title: Complete Blood Count (with Diff)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Define list of blood tests that represent a complete blood count with differential.),(Data Element Scope: This valueset is intended to work with the data element type, Laboratory Test),(Inclusion Criteria: Search terms included: CBC hemogram differential -WO -csf -fld -bone -performed -comment -Humidifier -ventilation -studies -Bronchial -glucuronidated),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
